casebody.data:
744 A.2d 1069 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND, Petitioner, v. Roger T. SCULLY, Respondent. Misc. AG No. 57,

Sept. Term, 1999.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Jan. 28, 2000.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the Consent to Disbarment from the practice of law filed by Roger T. Scully in accordance with Maryland Rule 16-712d2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 28th day of JANUARY, 2000

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that Roger T. Scully, be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent *407from the farther practice of law in the State of Maryland, and it is further,

ORDERED, that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of Roger T. Scully from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule 16-713, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
